name: tris3d-canvas
description: is a canvas to play tic tac toe in 3d

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run jekyll
scripts.gh-pages_push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages_pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run gh-pages_data; npm run cp_package.json; npm run homepage; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.postupdate-deps: git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run push
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages_push
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages_pull
